## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to collision
- Ensure there is enough space to place an entity by checking for any existing entities or obstacles in the intended placement area. Consider adjusting the spacing, changing the direction, or modifying the reference position to avoid collisions.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity (e.g., chest or mining drill) has items available for the inserter to pick up. Regularly check and manage inventory levels in source entities to prevent inserters from idling.
